question_text: Seema visited a Natural Gas Compressing Unit and found that the gas can be liquefied under specific conditions of temperature and pressure. While sharing her experience with friends she got confused. Help her to identity the correct set of conditions.
Which of the following are physical changes?

options.text: (iv) Drawing a wire of iron metal

question_text: In a sample of ethyl ethanoate (CH3COOC2H5) the two oxygen atoms have the same number of electrons but different number of neutrons. Which of the following is the correct reason for it?

options.text: One of the oxygen atoms has gained electrons
One of the oxygen atoms has gained two neutrons
The two oxygen atoms are isotopes
The two oxygen atoms are isobars.

question_text: A cell will swell up if

options.text: the concentration of water molecules in the cell is higher than the concentration of water molecules in the surrounding medium
